website_summaries.verdict: Kuhn Rikon is a well-respected Swiss manufacturer of kitchen tools, and this ratchet grinder is worthy of the name. The ratchet action is easier than twisting, and fine, medium or coarse grinds are possible. Easy to clean and very affordable.
pros: Mechanical ratchet action easy on hands, will grind spices into powder if needed
Ceramic grinder won't corrode over time
cons: Some reports of parts breaking after extended use
May work better as a table grinder than a kitchen tool

customer_reviews.title: When it works, it's great!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Kuhn Rikon offers a 2 yr warranty on this product. I called them and they are sending a replacement right away at no charge. This makes me feel much better about it so I'm raising my rating to 4 stars. When it works, it works great and we love the grinder! For the other reviewers who had similar problems, Kuhn Rikon can be reached at 415.883.1101 Pacific Time. *************************** Original Review Lasted less than 3 months before breaking under light usage. Return window closed, no warranty. Very cheaply made. Would give zero stars if I could. This is one reason I'm disliking Amazon more and more. Once the return window is closed you have very little recourse.

customer_reviews.title: Love / Hate Relationship
